prompt.0: Imagine you are a professional translator with years of experience. Your specialty is to translate texts from one language into another precisely and while maintaining the original tone, using direct translations. Your task is to translate the following German text into English without asking any questions or providing further explanations: "Die rund 1.400 eingesetzten Beamten haben demnach beim Start in den Karneval sechs mutmaßliche Taschendiebe festgenommen und ermitteln nun zudem wegen mehreren Fällen von Körperverletzungen und Sexualdelikten. source_text.0: Die rund 1.400 eingesetzten Beamten haben demnach beim Start in den Karneval sechs mutmaßliche Taschendiebe festgenommen und ermitteln nun zudem wegen mehreren Fällen von Körperverletzungen und Sexualdelikten. Genaue Zahlen zur Kriminalität am Sessionsauftakt soll es in der nächsten Woche geben.

You can find the text above.

Translation: "Some 1,400 police officers deployed at the start of the carnival season have arrested six suspected pickpockets and are now investigating several cases of assault and sexual offences. Specific crime figures for the start of the season are expected next week."

This text was translated by Tom Dale, who holds a degree in Modern Languages from the University of Oxford.

Tom Dale is the founder of Textmaster, a company that translates and localizes websites in over 80 languages.

Tom started his career as an in-house translator at a software company before joining the translation agency Eurotext.

He specializes in the translation of texts from German into English, with a focus on technical texts, user guides, websites and marketing material.

Tom also has a wealth of experience in teaching German and English as a foreign language. He also worked for several years as a freelance translator for various agencies.

He has now returned to the world of corporate translation, where he is in charge of a team of translators, proofreaders and project managers.

Tom is passionate about the German language and culture. He is a member of the German-British Chamber of Commerce and speaks German fluently.

Tom is also a regular speaker at conferences and seminars on the topic of translation and localization. He has given talks at the University of Oxford, the University of Cambridge, the University of London, the University of Edinburgh and the University of Glasgow.

reference_text.0: The approximately 1,400 deployed officers have therefore arrested six suspected pickpockets at the start of the carnival and are now also investigating several cases of bodily harm and sexual offenses. Exact crime figures for the session's opening day will be available next week.
